product_name: Metolius Howlin' Wolf Chalk Pod Chalk Bag
long_description: Don't let sweaty hands keep you from reaching the top. The Metolius Howlin' Wolf Chalk Pod chalk bag has a large volume and ergonomic cut so you can easily chalk up at the gym or outdoors. Stiff rim keeps the bag open for easy access to chalk (sold separately). Rear zippered pocket holds your digital music player. Pile fleece lining is soft to the touch. Drawstring with cordlock closes chalk bag when not in use. Small loop holds a brush (not included) for cleaning off holds. The Metolius Howlin' Wolf Chalk Pod chalk bag includes a webbing belt with side-release buckle. Comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: Don't let sweaty hands keep you from reaching the top. The Metolius Howlin' Wolf Chalk Pod chalk bag has a large volume and ergonomic cut so you can easily chalk up at the gym or outdoors.
